first_para: David Anderson (born 2 December 1953) is a Labour Party politician in the UK, who has been the Member of Parliament (MP) for Blaydon since 2005.

full.extract: David Anderson (born 2 December 1953) is a Labour Party politician in the UK, who has been the Member of Parliament (MP) for Blaydon since 2005.
full.title: David Anderson (British politician)
